New Records: Mohammad Rizwan equalled Babar's record as the fastest man to 2000 T20I runs
Key Match Events: Alex Hales made a half-century on his first England appearance in more than three years
Harry Brook produced perhaps the most fluent innings of the night
Luke Wood finished with 3 for 24 in his debut
Iftikhar Ahmed's three sixes in 28 from 17 provided only a flicker of the aggression needed
Pre-Game Insights: England selected a much-changed side, with Hales back, Salt opening for the first time and Duckett playing his second T20I
Pakistan's opening pair, Babar-Rizwan, had been under some heat recently
Post-Match Reflections: Alex Hales was happy to have made a comeback fifty after a long wait
England's chase was anchored by Hales' innings, which was a mix of aggression and caution
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under the Karachi floodlights
Pakistan's top three made more than two-thirds of the team's runs, in this case 69%
